app.title: Agri-Connect
app.subtitle: A smart and friendly marketplace connecting farmers and buyers.
app.name: Name

landing.homeDesc: Agri‚ÄëConnect is a smart digital platform that connects farmers and buyers directly, ensuring fair pricing and transparency. It uses Machine Learning (U‚ÄëNet and Vision Transformers) to detect and analyze crop quality from images. The platform supports multiple languages and includes a voice assistant for easy access. It empowers farmers, helps buyers get fresh produce, and promotes a sustainable agricultural ecosystem.
landing.featFarmersDesc: Upload crop images, enter type and quantity, and receive AI‚Äëbased price and quality predictions (U‚ÄëNet & ViT). Chat in real time with buyers, view feedback, and earn the Top‚ÄëRated Farmer badge when rating ‚â• 3.
landing.featBuyersDesc: Explore crops, view AI‚Äëestimated quality, and communicate directly with farmers. Make secure purchases, give ratings and feedback, and enjoy transparent prices for fresh produce.
landing.featAdminsDesc: Set and update daily market prices, manage users, monitor transactions, and view analytics to keep the platform fair, transparent, and reliable.
landing.featAIDesc: AI‚Äëpowered image analysis assesses crop health and suggests fair prices. Voice‚Äëbased multilingual assistant (Telugu, Hindi, English) helps users with low literacy.
landing.featRealtimeDesc: Live chat via socket.io, notifications, and secure JWT authentication for smooth, safe interactions.
landing.featLangDesc: Available in Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil, making it easy for illiterate users and farmers to access technology ‚Äî promoting inclusion, transparency, and sustainable rural growth.
